summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary from April 10, 2020, with a female victim (name redacted). She details being manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened by Leon Black, who she alleges ran a sex trafficking ring and had connections to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, Prince Andrew, and Harvey Weinstein. The document also mentions a non-disclosure agreement and a $10 million transfer from Black to Epstein.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Described as a manipulator who promised drugs, sexually abused the victim, used threats, claimed connections to police and powerful figures, and allegedly ran a sex trafficking ring. He is also said to have transferred $10 million to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a friend of Leon Black. The victim was taken to his Florida home, where he and Black pressured her to have sex with him, citing his alleged sex addiction.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The victim was introduced to her, along with Prince Andrew, among others connected to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The victim was introduced to him, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, among others connected to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Leon Black told the victim he was friends with him, along with Epstein and the police.

persons.name: Victoria Logvinsky
persons.context: Identified as one of the other women known to the victim who had been abused by Leon Black.

connections.description: Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Epstein around 2015.
Black told the victim he was friends with Epstein and took her to Epstein's Florida home.
The victim was introduced to Maxwell by Black or through his Epstein connections.
The victim was introduced to Prince Andrew by Black or through his Epstein connections.
Black told the victim he was friends with Weinstein.
Logvinsky is identified as one of the other women abused by Leon Black.
Both are mentioned in the context of the victim being introduced to Epstein's associates.

events.title: Victim meets Leon Black
events.description: The victim, who was modeling, met Leon Black.

events.title: Alleged rape by Leon Black
events.description: Leon Black allegedly forced his way into the victim's apartment and raped her.

events.title: Signing of Non-Disclosure Agreement
events.description: The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black.

events.title: $10M Transfer from Black to Epstein
events.description: Leon Black transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed telephonically by the FBI regarding her allegations against Leon Black and connections to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: A victim alleges Leon Black manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened her, claiming he ran a sex trafficking ring.
Leon Black allegedly told the victim he was friends with Jeffrey Epstein, Harvey Weinstein, and the police.
The victim states Leon Black transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein around 2015.
The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black in the fall of 2015.
The victim was introduced to Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew among Jeffrey Epstein's associates.
